item.title: ‘Akka Squad’ launched to strengthen safety of women and children
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: In a significant step towards ensuring the safety and security of women and children, the Karnataka government has launched a special “Akka Squad” in Raichur district. The initiative has been jointly implemented by the Women and Child Welfare Department and the District Police to provide timely protection, assistance and a sense of security to vulnerable sections of society.
The Akka Squad has been formed with the objective of preventing harassment, abuse and exploitation of women and ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Big Story, Tech News

item.title: Two women drown in canal in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two women drown in canal in Raichur
The deceased have been identified as Devamma Durugappa Pujari (30) and Eramma Venkatesh (40), both residents of Nanjaladinni village in Maski taluk...]]>
